arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli 1-1 Udinese: Match Report
arts.sum: In a tightly contested Serie A match, Empoli and Udinese battled to a 1-1 draw at the Stadio Carlo Castellani. The encounter saw Empoli take the lead in the first half through Pietro Pellegri, only for Udinese to equalize late in the game thanks to Keinan Davis. Empoli started strong, with Pellegri scoring the opening goal just before the half-hour mark. The young forward executed a well-placed shot from outside the box, sending a low drive past Udinese goalkeeper Maduka Okoye into the corner of the net. arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli v Udinese: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: As Empoli prepare to host Udinese in Serie A, both teams are grappling with injury concerns that will shape their tactical approaches. Empoli manager Roberto D’Aversa is expected to adopt a 3-5-2 formation, partly due to the unavailability of several key players. The attack will likely feature a partnership of Milan loanee Lorenzo Colombo and the in-form Pietro Pellegri. Despite a career marred by injuries, Pellegri has found his scoring touch, netting in his last two appearances. arts.ttl: Udinese’s Runjaic: “We need organisation and conviction in challenging times”
arts.sum: Udinese head coach Kosta Runjaic addressed the media ahead of the team’s upcoming match against Empoli, emphasizing the need for conviction and organization during a challenging period for the club. Runjaic acknowledged that the team is going through a phase where points are hard to come by, but stressed the importance of maintaining the right approach. “There are moments in the season when points don’t come, we need to know how to face them. We have all the means to play a good game,” he stated. arts.ttl: Serie A | Udinese v Empoli: Match Prediction, Preview, Team News and Lineups
arts.sum: As the 13th round of Serie A unfolds, Empoli and Udinese prepare for a pivotal encounter at Stadio Carlo Castellani on Monday evening. With just a single point separating the two sides in the league standings, this match presents an opportunity for both teams to improve their position and build momentum heading into the busy holiday period. Under the guidance of Roberto D’Aversa, Empoli have defied expectations this season.
